description: Modernize Data Center with UPS Rejuvenation Module
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Modular UPS Revitalization Service for Shared Services Canada ### Document Information - **Title (English)**: Modular UPS Revitalization Service for Shared Services Canada - **Title (French)**: Service de revitalisation des onduleurs modulaires pour Services partagés Canada - **Solicitation Number**: BPM018150/22179 - **Tender Closing Date**: March 10, 2023, at 14:00:00 ### Government Agency Information - **Contracting Authority**: Shared Services Canada (Services partagés Canada) - **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada - **Contact Information**: - **Name**: Agnes Kowalska - **Email**: agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca - **Phone**: 343-551-9034 - **Fax**: Not provided ### Tender Details This tender announcement is a request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Modular Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) Revitalization Services by Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) certified service providers for a Symmetra PX UPS located in downtown Ottawa, Ontario. The selected bidder will be required to demonstrate their technical capability and ability to complete the work. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. ### Mandatory Criteria - **Organization Security Clearance**: Successful bidders must hold a valid organization security clearance to be awarded the contract. - **Pricing**: Bidders must submit pricing according to the List of Deliverables and Pricing included in the Annex A of the RFP document. - **COVID-19 Submission Requirements**: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email. ### Annex Attachments The following documents are available for download: - Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing - Annex B – Statement of Work for Modular UPS Revitalization Service for Symmetra PX [Attach below the links to the attachments] Please refer to the Request for Quotations document for the complete details regarding this requirement, including the mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection. You can find all the information on the SSCP2 PSPC's website at [link].
**This tender announcement is now closed**
**Tender Status: Expired**
